"The Chocolate Way 2020":
"We've received reports of rampaging
Dragonkin near the Valentine's Day venue
in the Volcanic Caves of Amduscia.
Other enemies are also present, including
Darkers and Phantoms.
All ARKS are to dispatch and eliminate
these enemies to protect the venue.
――――――――――――――――――――
Can clear 3 times.
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires."

"Now preparing to transfer you!
Your objective is to subdue the rampaging enemies near the Valentine's Day venue!"

"In addition to Dragonkin, we've detected powerful Darker and Phantom readings!
Please be careful!"

"Work together with our beautiful girls to secure the venue!
The Chocolate Way is in your hands!"
